 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְלָא‎</span>] **verb Pa\`el** ==pray== (originally ***bow*** in prayer) ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id., bow***, Pa\`el ***pray***, so Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and Pa.; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒullû***</u></abbr>, ***entreat*** (apparently not of prayer to gods [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>KAT 3. 610 f.</sup>); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***middle of the back***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***pray***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bow***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pray***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צלות‎</span> ***shrine*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 125; AA 185</sup>); — ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְצַלֵּא‎</span> [[Dan.6.11|Dan 6:11]] (absolute); plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְצַלַּ֫יִן‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 47a</sup>)) [[Ezra.6.10|Ezra 6:10]] (with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> ***in behalf of***).
